function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Long-term effects on consumer psyche from pandemic","Impact":"Changes in consumer behavior and outlook","Mitigation":"Develop new marketing strategies and messaging","Technologies":"Data analysis tools for consumer insights","People":"Marketing teams, consumer behavior researchers","Owner":"Marketing teams, consumer behavior researchers"},{"Description":"Reluctance to engage in consumer research during pandemic","Impact":"Lack of fresh data and accurate insights","Mitigation":"Encourage and support consumer research efforts","Technologies":"Online survey platforms, data analytics software","People":"Marketing teams, consumer researchers","Owner":"Marketing teams, consumer researchers"},{"Description":"Littering of masks and gloves in public spaces","Impact":"Environmental pollution and hygiene risks","Mitigation":"Public education, disposal bins, and enforcement of regulations","Technologies":"Waste management and recycling systems","People":"General public, environmental organizations, local authorities","Owner":"Environmental organizations, local authorities"}]}
